text: The Wedding () is a 1944 Soviet movie directed by Isidor Annensky."Живот свой положил за Отечество"Свадьба It stars Alexey Gribov, Faina Ranevskaya, and Erast Garin. == Actors == * Alexey Gribov as Evdokim Zhigalov, father of the bride * Faina Ranevskaya as Nastassja Timofeevna Zhigalova, mother of the bride * Erast Garin as Epaminondas Maksimovic aplomb groom * Zoya Fyodorova as Dasha, bride * Nikolay Konovalov as Fyodor Yakovlevich Revunov-Karaulov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian romance movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:1944 romantic comedy movies Category:Movies about social class Category:Movies about weddings Category:Movies directed by Isidor Annensky Category:Soviet romance movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: The Wedding (1944 movie)
